name: Griffonage!
description: When monsters abound, and nightmares roam, who do you look towards? Well, I'd guess usually not a stick figure, but here we are. I mean, this guy doesn't even have a sword? what kind of heroic figure is he?! then again, is he a hero? what's he even doing? Perhaps looking for the truth of his existence? Pshh, like he'll ever find that...
